name: Trilogy Ventures China
description: Trilogy VC invests seed stage in China
overview:
Trilogy VC invests at the seed stage in promising start-ups based in China.

Founded by Steve Bell, Trilogy VC provides funding and assistance to help entrepreneurs start and build their business. Investments are focused on mobile applications, games, consumer web, and new media areas. Most of the teams funded so far are students or recent graduates from China’s top universities.

Portfolio companies include: http://www.jiathis.com http://www.fenzhi.com http://www.tucia.com http://www.youfeeling.com http://www.zepplab.com
